newsitem.title: ROMANIA: ROMANIAN LEU 3,157 TO DOLLAR FOR AUG 23-25 - BNR.
newsitem.headline: ROMANIAN LEU 3,157 TO DOLLAR FOR AUG 23-25 - BNR.

text.p: Romania's National Bank (BNR) announced the leu's reference rate at 3,157 to the dollar for August 23 to 25.
This reference rate was set on Wednesday as a weighted average based on daily reports of foreign exchange operators. It is a guidance rate used for statistical accounting purposes.
The leu's reference rate set on Tuesday for August 22 is also 3,157 to the dollar. It was 3,156 on Wednesday. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
